subSubSection.paragraph:
5067). I)
Petrochirus diogenes ( Linnaeus, 1758 )
(CCDB 5251). Animals from Brazil , São Paulo , Ubatuba (E–I), São Sebastião (A–D). Sex: male (C–E, G–I), female (A, B, F). Scale bars (mm): A—15; B, H –11; C—28; D—25; E, F—18; G—20; I—50. Photographs by R.C. Buranelli.
